TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit CustomAttributeBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._CustomAttributeBuilder

span.span: Helps build custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`CustomAttributeBuilder`描述自訂屬性的建構函式所傳回的物件。Use the `CustomAttributeBuilder` object returned by the constructor to describe the custom attribute. 關聯`CustomAttribute`與藉由呼叫產生器執行個體`SetCustomAttribute`該產生器執行個體上的方法。Associate the `CustomAttribute` with a builder instance by calling the `SetCustomAttribute` method on that builder instance. 例如，建立`CustomAttributeBuilder`來描述的執行個體`AssemblyCultureAttribute`藉由提供的建構函式及其引數。For example, create a `CustomAttributeBuilder` to describe an instance of `AssemblyCultureAttribute` by supplying the constructor of and its argument. 然後呼叫上`AssemblyBuilder`建立關聯。Then call on an `AssemblyBuilder` to establish the association. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用`CustomAttributeBuilder`。The following code sample illustrates the use of `CustomAttributeBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instances of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public CustomAttributeBuilder (System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo con, object[] constructorArgs);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo con, object[] constructorArgs) cil managed
Public Sub New (con As ConstructorInfo, constructorArgs As Object())

param.name: con
param.span: 自訂屬性的建構函式。

span.span: The constructor for the custom attribute.

param.name: constructorArgs
param.span: 自訂屬性之建構函式的引數。

span.span: The arguments to the constructor of the custom attribute.

summary.span: 指定自訂屬性的建構函式與建構函式的引數，初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class given the constructor for the custom attribute and the arguments to the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`constructorArgs`陣列會限制為項目型別。The elements of the `constructorArgs` array are restricted to element types. 它們可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`、 列舉、 類型、 任何先前的已轉換成物件或任何上述類型的一維、 以零為起始的陣列的型別。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types.

span.span: is static or private.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的引數數目不符合建構函式呼叫慣例所需之建構函式的參數數目。

span.span: The number of supplied arguments does not match the number of parameters of the constructor as required by the calling convention of the constructor.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的引數類型不符合建構函式中宣告的參數類型。

span.span: The type of supplied argument does not match the type of the parameter declared in the constructor.
-or-

exception.span: 提供的引數不是 或 的參考類型。

span.span: A supplied argument is a reference type other than or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`constructorArgs`和`fieldValues`陣列會限制為項目型別。The elements of the `constructorArgs` and `fieldValues` arrays are restricted to element types. 它們可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`、 列舉、 類型、 任何先前的已轉換成物件或任何上述類型的一維、 以零為起始的陣列的型別。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不包含在私用欄位`namedFields`。Do not include private fields in `namedFields`. 這樣做會導致擲回時稍後完成的類型上呼叫方法。Doing so will cause to be thrown when the method is later called on the completed type.

exception.span: 和 陣列的長度不同。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`constructorArgs`， `propertyValues`，或`fieldValues`陣列會限制為項目型別。The elements of the `constructorArgs`, `propertyValues`, or `fieldValues` arrays are restricted to element types. 它們可以是`byte`， `sbyte`， `int`， `uint`， `long`， `ulong`， `float`， `double`， `String`， `char`， `bool`、 列舉、 類型、 任何先前的已轉換成物件或任何上述類型的一維、 以零為起始的陣列的型別。They can be `byte`, `sbyte`, `int`, `uint`, `long`, `ulong`, `float`, `double`, `String`, `char`, `bool`, an enum, a type, any of the previous types that was cast to an object, or a single-dimension, zero-based array of any of the previous types. > [!IMPORTANT] > 私用屬性或欄位中的不包含`namedProperties`或`namedFields`。Do not include private properties or fields in `namedProperties` or `namedFields`. 這樣做會導致擲回時稍後完成的類型上呼叫方法。Doing so will cause to be thrown when the method is later called on the completed type.

MemberSignature.Value: void _CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Runtime.InteropServices._CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames([in]valuetype System.Guid& riid, native int rgszNames, unsigned int32 cNames, unsigned int32 lcid, native int rgDispId) cil managed
Sub GetIDsOfNames (ByRef riid As Guid, rgszNames As IntPtr, cNames As UInteger, lcid As UInteger, rgDispId As IntPtr) Implements _CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames

virtual void System.Runtime.InteropServices._CustomAttributeBuilder.GetIDsOfNames(Guid % riid, IntPtr rgszNames, System::UInt32 cNames, System::UInt32 lcid, IntPtr rgDispId) = System::Runtime::InteropServices::_CustomAttributeBuilder::GetIDsOfNames;

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要對應之傳入的名稱陣列。

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

param.name: cNames
param.span: 要對應的名稱計數。

span.span: Count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 用於解譯名稱的地區設定內容。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret the names.

param.name: rgDispId
param.span: 呼叫端配置的陣列，用於接收對應於名稱的 ID。

span.span: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 將一組名稱對應至一組對應的分派識別項 (Dispatch Identifier)。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 如需有關`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 方法使用 COM IDispatch 介面進行晚期繫結呼叫。

span.span: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.

param.name: iTInfo
param.span: 要傳回的類型資訊。

span.span: The type information to return.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 類型資訊的地區設定識別項。

span.span: The locale identifier for the type information.

param.name: ppTInfo
param.span: 接收要求的類型資訊物件的指標。

span.span: Receives a pointer to the requested type information object.

summary.span: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.

Sub Invoke (dispIdMember As UInteger, ByRef riid As Guid, lcid As UInteger, wFlags As Short, pDispParams As IntPtr, pVarResult As IntPtr, pExcepInfo As IntPtr, puArgErr As IntPtr) Implements _CustomAttributeBuilder.Invoke

param.name: dispIdMember
param.span: 辨識成員。

span.span: Identifies the member.

param.name: riid
param.span: 保留供未來使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必須是 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: lcid
param.span: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

span.span: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the call.

param.name: pDispParams

span.span: The index of the first argument that has an error.

summary.span: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

span.span: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
